thread.title: Queues on roads and ferries as thousands head to Bestival | Meridian
thread.title_full: Queues on roads and ferries as thousands head to Bestival | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Queues on roads and ferries as thousands head to Bestival | Meridian
text:
An estimated 55,000 music fans are heading to the Isle of Wight today, for this year's Bestival festival.
Bestival queues Credit: Paul Britton There are queues for the ferries and, once on the island, queues for the Bestival buses.
The music event runs from today until Sunday and acts include Duran Duran, The Chemical Brothers, Missy Elliott, and many more big names.
The initial Bestival attracted 10,000 people, growing to 55,000 in 2010.
